contents.text: Welcome to uBiome, the San Francisco-based biotechnology leader in human microbiome sequencing.
For questions about test kits and orders, press 1.
To place a new test kit order, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our kit ordering team.

navigationGoals: I need to place a new uBiome microbiome test kit order quickly.
Order a new microbiome test kit to evaluate my gut health after returning from deployment
Place a new microbiome sequencing kit order with expedited shipping and confirm sample collection protocol.
I want to order a new at-home microbiome sampling kit.
I’d like to place an order for a new microbiome sampling kit.

contents.text: To check the status of an existing order, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve your order status information.

navigationGoals: I want to check the current status of my existing test kit order.
Check on the delivery status of the microbiome kit I ordered last week
Retrieve the current tracking details and status of my existing uBiome test kit order.
I want to check if my kit has been shipped.
I’d like to check the delivery status of the microbiome sampling kit I already ordered.

contents.text: For assistance with your test results and lab reports, press 2.
To discuss your microbiome test results, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a results specialist.

navigationGoals: I’d like to discuss my microbiome test results with a specialist.
Discuss my microbiome test results to understand how they might relate to my stress and digestion
Connect with a specialist to review the bioinformatic analysis and interpretation of my microbiome test results.
I’d like to talk through what my microbiome results mean.
I’d like to review and discuss the details of my microbiome sequencing results.

contents.text: For technical support with your account or reports, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I’m having trouble accessing my test report online and need technical support.
Get help logging in and downloading my lab report from the uBiome account
Get technical support for accessing my account dashboard and downloading my lab report PDFs.
I need help resetting my account password to view my lab report.
I’m unable to access my uBiome account to retrieve my lab reports; I need technical assistance.
